snippet.title: Justice Duel NES Trailer - Mega Cat Studios Video Game
snippet.description:
Take to the skies on the back of scientifically-engineered eagles and joust against AI patriots from America’s past. Dodge fireworks, bear traps, and dead presidents. The history might be wrong, but the justice is so right.

    Mech-eagle based combat for true patriots

    Firecrackers, bear traps & land mine eagle eggs to amp up the carnage

    Old Glory and Lincoln's Axe activate the ultimate power-ups

    Want Justice for All?  Grab an NES Fourscore and enjoy 4-player combat the new fashioned way!

For real founding fathers (and mothers!), the limited edition comes with a cover* for the NES Fourscore! Less than 1% of the NES's original library made use of this device, but now you can bring freedom to more friends at the same time!

Go Fourth and Couch Co-op!

Get your copy today: https://megacatstudios.com/collections/8-bit/products/justice-duel-for-the-nintendo-entertainment-system

Come join in on the discussion at our official Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/megacat

Justice Duel is not licensed, sponsored, published, or endorsed by Nintendo Co. Ltd, or their affiliates.

Mega Cat Studios is an independent games development studio. This title is an unofficial and unlicensed release for the Nintendo console, and is not affiliated with Nintendo Co., Ltd, or their affiliates. 

Nintendo® and Famicom® are trademarks of Nintendo Co., Ltd.
For more on Mega Cat Studios and our games, please visit: https://megacatstudios.com/

Come play & talk on discord! www.discord.gg/megacat
